column4: I'v made a mistake. I ran command: dd if=ubuntu.iso of=/dev/sdb ds=1. (iso image equals 700Mb) How long will it be going?
If you have anything important on /dev/sdb press ctrl+c to stop that command NOW
Can you pastebin the output of "dmesg"?
WOW. you are a magician. May be even David Blain are envying to you. Somehow after your words the disk is playing!!!! :D
